price: ¿Acaso poseen los tesoros de tu Señor o tienen autoridad absoluta?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
